@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Yes, you search for the command name, not the command itself. EG: Search for noclip, not ::noclip

item.title: How do you stop a person from getting ban by using noclip?
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

here replace your entire noclip command with this

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) { if (absY <= 3000) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a n00b who wants to cheat!"); showInterface(99999999); // Xerozcheez: Haha take that noob disconnected = true; } else { sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a n00b who wants to cheat! :0"); MainHelpMenu(); } }

hope that helps ya

Read full topic
